product_name: NRS HydroSkin 0.5 Capri Pants with Skirt - Women's
long_description: Combining a water-friendly fit with a feminine skirt, the women's NRS HydroSkin(R) 0.5 Capris offer just the right amount of warmth for cool days on the water without feeling bulky or restrictive. 0.5 mm Terraprene(TM) neoprene with heat-reflecting titanium cuts the chill on cool days. 4-way-stretch exterior allows unrestricted movement, and the soft lining feels great against your skin. Skirt made of lightweight fabric adds a touch of style and modesty. Paddler-specific design allows unrestricted freedom of movement and puts seams where they won't cause irritation. A zippered stash pocket in the waistband lets you keep small essentials handy. Waist drawcord cinches with a barrel lock for a secure fit. Durable water repellent exterior coating sheds water to help reduce evaporative cooling. The women's NRS HydroSkin 0.5 Capris offer a next-to-skin fit.
short_description: Combining a water-friendly fit with a feminine skirt, the women's NRS HydroSkin(R) 0.5 Capris offer just the right amount of warmth for cool days on the water without feeling bulky or restrictive.
